caption: A pair of diving goggles fell from shallow waters into the deep sea. The clownfish was very distressed. He and the blue tropical fish swam into the deep sea, where it quickly became pitch dark. Suddenly, a light source appeared, and a sharp-toothed creature appeared before them. Two tropical fish found the goggles on the seabed and tried to read the text on them. As the creature attacked the clownfish, its eyes got stuck in the goggles, rendering it immobile. The scene then shifted to a room that was very dark, with a fish tank inside. Inside the fish tank were some tropical fish, chatting with each other in the pool.
